#########
Community
#########

Below follows instructions on how to contribute and report issues with Learning Simulator.


**********
Contribute
**********

We welcome contributions from anyone via pull requests on GitHub. If you donâ€™t feel comfortable modifying or adding functionality, we also welcome feature requests as GitHub issues.


*****************************
Questions, issues or problems
*****************************

We welcome bug reports, as well as questions about Learning Simulator, as GitHub issues.
